vision: Make FrankX.ai the intelligence operating system for creators, families, and executives by blending conscious AI adoption, music-led expression, and enterprise-grade governance.

pillars.title: Conscious AI Integration
pillars.description: Deploy ethical, human-centered AI systems with clear guardrails, education paths, and measurable impact across every FrankX offering.

pillars.title: Strategic Business Intelligence
pillars.description: Translate field research and telemetry into frameworks that accelerate transformation for founders, studios, and Fortune 500 partners.

pillars.title: Creative & Innovation Excellence
pillars.description: Build Vibe OS and music rituals that keep artistry at the center while scaling with Suno, Runway, and multi-agent collaboration.

pillars.title: Community & Collaboration
pillars.description: Run the Intelligence Atlas and Creation Chronicles as living knowledge commons, inviting contributions and highlighting community wins.

milestones.focus: Launch Volume I of the Intelligence Atlas, refresh FrankX product positioning, and publish weekly creative intelligence dispatches.
deliverables: FrankX Intelligence Atlas Vol. I live with executive summary and call-to-action loops
Roadmap landing page aggregating specs, rituals, and upcoming drops
SEO content expansion targeting agentic AI, creative OS, and enterprise governance keywords

milestones.focus: Scale revenue engines, expand community rituals, and publish infrastructure sustainability research.
deliverables: Volume III and IV derived product bundles with price ladders
Community Resonance Loop automation and reporting dashboards
Infrastructure + sustainability atlas drop with partner spotlights

rituals.name: Daily Intelligence Operations
rituals.description: Log content, product, and community updates with accountable owners and next steps.

rituals.name: Atlas Sync
rituals.description: Review signals, adoption metrics, and field telemetry to prioritize roadmap experiments.

rituals.name: Launch Calibration
rituals.description: Align SEO, product funnels, and partner activations against quarterly milestones and KPIs.

signals.name: Atlas Volume Delivery
signals.metric: 10,000 words per volume with changelog updates
signals.target: Publish each volume on a monthly cadence across 2025

signals.name: Creative OS Adoption
signals.metric: Conversion rate from Vibe OS and Agentic Creator OS landing pages
signals.target: Lift qualified leads by 35% via new CTA pathways

signals.name: Governance Readiness
signals.metric: Clients advancing to Level 3 in the governance maturity model
signals.target: Move 60% of active partners into integrated governance rituals by Q3
